Package com.Handin

Class Meter

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.Handin.Meter
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    BatteryMeter
    public class Meter
extends java.lang.Object
    The 'Meter' class represents an object that manages the consumption and production of a particular utility.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      protected double costToReturn  

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      Meter​(java.lang.String utilityName)
      Deprecated.
      Constructor for debugging purposes
      Meter​(java.lang.String utilityName, double unitCost)
      Constructor which initialises the properties which stores the type of utility along with its unit cost and meter reading
      Meter​(java.lang.String utilityName, double unitCost, double meterReading)
      Overloaded constructor which allows the client to input their own initial meter reading

      Method to update meterReading with number of units used since last reading
      double getUnitCost()  
      protected java.lang.String getUtilityName()  
      double report()
      Method to report the amount of units the utility has used and the corresponding cost

    • Constructor Detail

      • Meter

        public Meter​(java.lang.String utilityName,
             double unitCost)
        Constructor which initialises the properties which stores the type of utility along with its unit cost and meter reading
        Parameters:
        utilityName - A String representing the name of the utility (e.g: Electricity)
        unitCost - Cost per unit stored as a double

      • Meter

        public Meter​(java.lang.String utilityName,
             double unitCost,
             double meterReading)
        Overloaded constructor which allows the client to input their own initial meter reading
        Parameters:
        utilityName - A String for the name of utility (e.g: Electricity)
        unitCost - Cost per unit stored as a double
        meterReading - Initial meter reading stored as a double
